generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings and tram tracks, indicating it is a road.
- building: Several multi-story buildings are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible behind the bus, separating the road from a building.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image.
- bus: A large public transport bus is prominently featured in the center of the image.
- train: A tram or train is visible on the left side of the image, partially obscured by a building.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and the bus.
- person: A person is visible inside the bus, sitting near the front.
- car: The front of a car is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the photo was taken from inside a car.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Some vegetation is visible on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
